body.div1:
Invoice and Price List
Marietta June 8 1805
M G. W. Treat Bot. of Benja Ives Gilman
1 Mill Saw _____________________ $14. 00
1 doz Sickles___________________ 10. 50
5 ps Linen 1771 yds @ 55________ 97. 62
1 ps Check 26 " @ 46____ 11. 96
5 ps blue Handkf8 @____________ 23. 44
6 Rules @ 30___________________ 1. 80
8 yds Country Linen @ 50________ 4. 00
4 Draws Knives @ 70_____________ 2. 80
4 " @ 60 __________ 2. 40
$168. 52
[Endorsed by Moses Austin:] G W Treat Note paid June 8 1805 Gilmans Invoice
